snippet.title: Ben Goertzel: Modeling Pathways Toward Technological Singularity via Hyper-Intelligent Economics
snippet.description:
The Beneficial AGI Summit & Unconference 2025 (BGI-25) convened leading AI researchers, innovators, policymakers, and technologists from October 21 to 23 in Istanbul, Türkiye, to examine critical developments in AI and discuss how to guide AGI toward a future defined by compassion and abundance.

The Summit kicked off with an opening keynote by Dr. Ben Goertzel, CEO of SingularityNET and the ASI Alliance, introducing "Hyper-Intelligent Economics," a mathematical and quantitative framework modeling economic evolution as least-effort geodesics between current conditions and potential futures.

Applying this to analyze Singularity pathways under various competition structures and potential shocks, Dr. Goertzel demonstrated both the difficulty of re-targeting social and economic trajectories once they begin to lock in and that "infrastructure is the best investment" for preventing unfavorable outcomes, advocating for broad coverage and "periphery-first activity" over targeted wealth transfers.

The BGI Conversation Continues Online
To deepen connections, continue conversations, and co-create real progress toward Beneficial AGI, join the BGI Nexus community calls, workshops, working groups, and showcases: https://www.bginexus.io/events

 #AGI #DecentralizedAGI

----

SingularityNET was founded by Dr. Ben Goertzel with the mission of creating a decentralized, democratic, inclusive, and beneficial Artificial General Intelligence (AGI). An AGI is not dependent on any central entity, is open to anyone, and is not restricted to the narrow goals of a single corporation or even a single country.

The SingularityNET team includes seasoned engineers, scientists, researchers, entrepreneurs, and marketers. Our core platform and AI teams are further complemented by specialized teams devoted to application areas such as finance, robotics, biomedical AI, media, arts, and entertainment.

Website: https://singularitynet.io
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/singularitynet
X: https://x.com/SingularityNET
Instagram: https://instagram.com/singularitynet.io
Discord: https://discord.gg/snet 
Telegram: https://t.me/singularitynet
ASI Alliance on X: https://x.com/ASI_Alliance
ASI Alliance on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/artificial-superintelligence-alliance
